GSD.product_version: versions from v2.6.29 to before v5.10.163
GSD.description:
drivers: dio: fix possible memory leak in dio_init()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.163 by commit fce9890e1be4c0460dad850cc8c00414a9d25f0f, it was introduced in version v2.6.29 by commit 2e4c77bea3d8b17d94f8ee382411f359b708560f. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: drivers: dio: fix possible memory leak in dio_init()
